pkgmetadata.longdescription: ----------------------------Virtual MySQL-python package----------------------------This package is a 'virtual package', which requires MySQL-python (Python 2)or mysqlclient (Python 3) to install.In effect, this means 'pip install mysql' will actually install MySQL-python.Instead of depending on this package, please depend on the relevant packagedirectly.See also:- https://pypi.python.org/pypi/MySQL-python- https://pypi.python.org/pypi/mysqlclient
